-- Drop database if it exists
DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS Demo
GO

-- Create new database
CREATE DATABASE [Demo];
GO

-- use Demo database
USE Demo;
GO

-- Create a data source in serverless SQL pool service to access an Azure Storage Account
-- There is no credential in data source. We are using public storage account which doesn't need a secret.
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE AzureOpenData;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE AzureOpenData
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/')


-- Create the view based on the external demo data for Power BI to consume 
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS usPopulationView;
GO

CREATE VIEW usPopulationView AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'censusdatacontainer/release/us_population_county/year=20*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'AzureOpenData',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS uspv;
